payload.description: The population in 2022 of Bitterfeld-Wolfen was 39,103 inhabitants. The entire ABW region had 370,190 inhabitants at that time. The following chart shows a forecast of the population development for the years 2022, 2030, and 2045.
payload.name: Bitterfeld-Wolfen
